probe
Class ObjectManager

java.lang.Object
  probe.ObjectManager
public class ObjectManager
extends java.lang.Object

A Flyweight Factory for managing the objects representing classes, methods, etc.

Constructor Summary

Method Detail

v

public static ObjectManager v()
Returns the singleton instance of an ObjectManager.

getClass

public ProbeClass getClass(java.lang.String pkg,
                           java.lang.String name)
Returns the object representing a class, creating if if necessary.

Parameters:
pkg - - The package containing the class, with subpackages separated by dots.
name - - The name of the class (not including the package name), as it appears in Java bytecode.

getClass

public ProbeClass getClass(java.lang.String fullName)
Returns the object representing a class, creating if if necessary.

Parameters:
fullName - - The name of the class including the package name, with subpackages separated by dots.

getMethod

public ProbeMethod getMethod(ProbeClass cls,
                             java.lang.String name,
                             java.lang.String signature)
Returns the object representing a method, creating it if necessary.

Parameters:
cls - - The object representing the declaring class of the method.
name - - The name of the method.
signature - - The arguments to the method, in the same format as in Java bytecode.
